headline.main: Samsung Buys LoopPay, a Competitor to Apple’s Mobile Wallet

docs.snippet: The move comes just a few months after the release of Apple Pay, Apple’s mobile payments product....

headline.main: 'American Sniper' Murder Suspect Battling 'Demons,' Sister Testifies
headline.print_headline: 'American Sniper' Murder Suspect Battling 'Demons,' Sister Testifies

docs.snippet: The man accused of murdering former U.S. Navy SEAL sniper Chris Kyle went through debilitating bouts of paranoia and had a hair-trigger temper, his relatives and girlfriend told a court on Wednesday, according to media reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: The man accused of murdering former U.S. Navy SEAL sniper Chris Kyle went through debilitating bouts of paranoia and had a hair-trigger temper, his relatives and girlfriend told a court on Wednesday, according to media reports.

headline.main: Hershey Plans to Use Simpler Ingredients in Products
headline.print_headline: Hershey Plans to Use Simpler Ingredients in Products

docs.snippet: Hershey Co said it would start using simpler ingredients in its chocolate bars and kisses brands, the latest chocolate maker yielding to U.S. consumers' concerns about the quality and sourcing of food....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hershey Co said it would start using simpler ingredients in its chocolate bars and kisses brands, the latest chocolate maker yielding to U.S. consumers' concerns about the quality and sourcing of food.

headline.main: Brown Sworn In as Governor of Oregon

docs.snippet: Kate Brown, a Democrat, was sworn in to replace John Kitzhaber, who resigned last week after inquiries were begun into his fiancée’s finances and role in his administration....

headline.main: Famed UNLV Coach Gets Tribute Only Las Vegas Could Swing
headline.print_headline: Famed UNLV Coach Gets Tribute Only Las Vegas Could Swing

headline.main: Official: Video Shows Jenner Rear-Ended Cars in Fatal Wreck
headline.print_headline: Official: Video Shows Jenner Rear-Ended Cars in Fatal Wreck

headline.main: As CEOs Seek Tax Cuts, Senator Slams Corporate Tax Haven Use
headline.print_headline: As CEOs Seek Tax Cuts, Senator Slams Corporate Tax Haven Use

docs.snippet: Senator Bernie Sanders lashed out on Wednesday at widespread use of offshore tax havens by U.S. companies, and the liberal independent targeted a group that represents CEOs of big corporations and wants corporate taxes lowered....
docs.lead_paragraph: Senator Bernie Sanders lashed out on Wednesday at widespread use of offshore tax havens by U.S. companies, and the liberal independent targeted a group that represents CEOs of big corporations and wants corporate taxes lowered.

headline.main: Cuba Temporarily Cuts Price of Internet Access
headline.print_headline: Cuba Temporarily Cuts Price of Internet Access

docs.snippet: Cuba has temporarily reduced the hourly charge for using state-run Internet cafes in the country's first small but substantive public move to increase online access since the declaration of detente with the U.S....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cuba has temporarily reduced the hourly charge for using state-run Internet cafes in the country's first small but substantive public move to increase online access since the declaration of detente with the U.S.
